about_the_game:
President Joe Biden has managed to survive his first 3 weeks in office. After "defeating" Putin and Donald Trump in chapter 1, Joe can turn his eyes to "building America back better".

Unfortunately for Mister 46, he faces his most dangerous obstacles and opponents yet:

1. Jeo Boden - crypto meme sensation
2. Mucker Tarlsen - the firebrand right wing populist journalist
3. His wife Jill Biden
4. US Congresswoman Lauren Boebert
5. A once friendly media now turned frenemy
6. Conniving undercover customers posing as "woke supporters"
7. And more!

In this expanded sequel, Escape From MAGA Chapter 2 will allow you to guide President Biden in his attempts to defeat the world's most popular political meme crypto currency while also fulfilling his grocery shopping for the week. It's still months away until the November 2024 elections, and Joe needs to clear his plate of all these pesky problems and mockery events for his possible second term in office. Or else President Trump comes back and...

The Gameplay:

In this visual novel, you are presented with numerous dialogue options throughout the game to see what response Joe Biden or NPC's will give when reacting to story elements and mishaps. It is up to you to decide which option to choose from each dialogue menu choice. Each situation is different, and so will the response from these characters. Choose carefully!

The story will do a great job setting up the context of the situation before you get to choose what to do. After selecting your choice, sit back and watch the hijinks unfold and have a great set of laughs as the story progresses.

Features include:

1. Choosing the right excuses to calm the wife down
2. Figuring out the best way to neutralize or bribe the social media account of Jeo Boden
3. The satisfaction of being ridiculed by everyone but not caring about the consequences of your decisions
4. Three additional weeks of goofs, mayhem, and disaster prone events that only Mister 46 has the apathy needed to endure.
*** 5. A secret interview between Tucker Carlson and Vladimir Putin that unveils the conspiracy behind the United States founding and their true goals for the world. And hence why Putin is behaving "erratically".
6. And lots more!

We value everyone's feedback and used the previous comments and suggestions from Chapter 1 to explore new content ideas in chapter 2. Let us know in the discussion boards what else you'd like to see or suggestions for improvements and future ideas!

legal_notice: All events depicted in this game are works of fiction, even though many characters and events were in fact based on real life occurrences.
name: Joe Biden Vs. Jeo Boden - Escape From MAGA Chapter 2

  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any

  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: Joe Biden is back as the one term president hoping to become the two time president. November 2024 is only months away but the world is getting more ridiculing by the day. Choose your decisions wisely and help Mister 46 survive his next 3 weeks in office. You must help Joe Escape From MAGA, again.
